events.name: Singapore SharePoint Community Meeting - October 2016
events.description: Hi All, OneDrive for Business – Current State and New FeaturesRene Modery, Office Servers and Services MVP At the Microsoft Ignite conference, which is taking place this week in Atlanta, Microsoft announced several new features and controls for OneDrive for Business.In this session, Office Servers and Services MVP Rene Modery will review the existing OneDrive for Business functionality, and provide an overview of the upcoming improvements. We will look at both the end user’s as well as corporate administrator’s perspective and possibilities in order to provide a comprehensive overview of this essential part of Office 365.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: Introduction to Swift 3 + iOS Workshop
events.description:
Swift is a new programming language for iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS app development. The session will concentrate on mobile application development and provide basic of Swift 3 and essentials knowledge on iOS required to get you started on creating your very own iOS applications. 

The speaker, Subhransu Behera, is currently the lead Mobile Developer @ Singapore Power and has years of experience in working at tech giants such as PayPal, SAP and HCL.

Please note that this workshop requires Xcode 8.

Sign up for this or any of the other $PATH to iNTUition workshops at https://ieeentu.typeform.com/to/SAqemr.
